results.content: Very easy to follow, even though the Amazon Alexa interface changed considerably.  What you need to understand is that the Flash Briefing template is for today's [news, tips, weathers, etc.].  It cannot be used for serial playing of a course or book.  But this is going to be perfect for all of you looking to post something new each day.  The only problems I encountered were the proper sequencing on Lipsyn and the timing out of each days news.  That's on me.  Not the course.
results.content_html: Very easy to follow, even though the Amazon Alexa interface changed considerably. What you need to understand is that the Flash Briefing template is for today's [news, tips, weathers, etc.]. It cannot be used for serial playing of a course or book. But this is going to be perfect for all of you looking to post something new each day. The only problems I encountered were the proper sequencing on Lipsyn and the timing out of each days news. That's on me. Not the course.

results.content: A little too much Alexa background/basic concepts.  I think most people wanting to do a flash briefing would already be intimately familiar with the basic stuff.
results.content_html: A little too much Alexa background/basic concepts. I think most people wanting to do a flash briefing would already be intimately familiar with the basic stuff.

results.content: This course was a lot of fun, and I would say that the length was just right. Tom does a good job narrating, is interesting and offers some decent takeaways.
results.content_html: This course was a lot of fun, and I would say that the length was just right. Tom does a good job narrating, is interesting and offers some decent takeaways.

results.content:
The best Alexa Skills and Flash Briefing course out there!
If you are interested in that, and you should be - look no further.
results.content_html:
The best Alexa Skills and Flash Briefing course out there!
If you are interested in that, and you should be - look no further.

results.content: I thought this was a great introductory course to creating an Alexa Flash Briefing without coding skills. There were some times when the audio was not understandable butt that only happened in a couple of places and I don't think I missed anything. I would like a little more info on text flash briefings for instance good free dependable places to host a compatible feed etc and how to make a json file with multiple items one for each day where Alexa would only read the one for that day etc but all in all I felt like I got my money's worth so Thanks!
results.content_html: I thought this was a great introductory course to creating an Alexa Flash Briefing without coding skills. There were some times when the audio was not understandable butt that only happened in a couple of places and I don't think I missed anything. I would like a little more info on text flash briefings for instance good free dependable places to host a compatible feed etc and how to make a json file with multiple items one for each day where Alexa would only read the one for that day etc but all in all I felt like I got my money's worth so Thanks!

results.content: Thank you very much. Had a lot of fun and it was totally easy to create a flash briefing while listening.
results.content_html: Thank you very much. Had a lot of fun and it was totally easy to create a flash briefing while listening.

results.content: Der Kurs zeigt sehr gut, wie einfach es ist, ein "Flash Briefing" Skill für Alexa zu entwickeln. Leider kommt zu kurz, wie das Produkt für den Nutzer am Ende aussehen wird. Klingt trivial, ist es aber nicht. Beispiel: Welche Informationen kann man dem Nutzer in der Alexa-App mitgeben? An welcher Stelle müsste zusätzliche Links einbauen?
results.content_html: Der Kurs zeigt sehr gut, wie einfach es ist, ein "Flash Briefing" Skill für Alexa zu entwickeln. Leider kommt zu kurz, wie das Produkt für den Nutzer am Ende aussehen wird.
